name: flexgrid
description: Reactive spreadsheet demonstrations using F# and Partas.Solid - proving spreadsheets are functional programming

scripts.fable: dotnet fable demos --exclude Partas.Solid.FablePlugin --noCache -o output -e .fs.jsx -c Release
scripts.fable:watch: dotnet fable watch demos --exclude Partas.Solid.FablePlugin --noCache -o output -e .fs.jsx -c Release
